prompt: A deep house track with a relentless four-on-the-floor kick and tight offbeat hi-hats from a drum machine. A warm analog synth bass pulses underneath while bright plucky synth chords shimmer on top, creating a hypnotic late-night club groove. Instrumental, no vocals, clean modern production.

prompt_fields.control_delta: Base timbre: analog synth bass + drum machine
